sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO ZG_T_ORDERBOM_MOVE_LOG ( CUID , SOURCE_ORDER_ID , SOURCE_IDNRK , TARGET_ORDER_ID , MOVE_NUM , TARGET_IDNRK ) VALUES ( #cuid# , #sourceOrderId# , #sourceIdnrk# , #targetOrderId# , #moveNum# , #targetIdnrk# )
select sys_guid() AS ID FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ZG_T_ORDERBOM_MOVE_LOG SET SOURCE_ORDER_ID = #sourceOrderId# , SOURCE_IDNRK = #sourceIdnrk# , TARGET_ORDER_ID = #targetOrderId# , MOVE_NUM = #moveNum# , TARGET_IDNRK = #targetIdnrk# WHERE CUID = #cuid#
